import React, {useState} from 'react' import {useLocation, useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import About from './About/About' //import Stats from './Stats/Stats' import Evolution from './Evolution/Evolution' import Moves from './Moves/Moves' import TitleComponent from './TitleComponent' import './PokemonDetail.css' const PokemonDetail = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const location = useLocation() const pokemon = location.state.pokemon const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState("about") const TABS = { "about": , //"stats": , "evolution" : , "moves": } const getRand = (types) => Math.floor(Math.random() * types) return (
{pokemon.map(poke => (

{poke.name}

{poke.types.map((type, index) => (

{type.type.name}

))}
  • setActiveTab("about")}>About
  • setActiveTab("evolution")}>Evolution
  • setActiveTab("moves")}>Moves
{TABS[activeTab]}
))}
) } export default PokemonDetail
